message.content:
I don't think anyone is always right - that would be quite extraordinary! We all have different perspectives, knowledge gaps, and make mistakes sometimes. Even experts in their fields get things wrong occasionally.

What makes you feel like you might always be right? Are you thinking about a particular situation, or is this more of a general feeling you have?
